synopsis.text: Makotoware Yoshioka, a teacher rendered speechless due to a childhood mishap, finds himself amidst the vibrant lives of elementary school children on a quaint island. Based on Shizuka Ijuin's best-selling novel, this heartwarming tale unfolds as Yoshioka navigates through his unique teaching journey, communicating and connecting with his young students in extraordinary ways. Witness the touching exchanges and poignant moments that shape their lives in this captivating anime adaptation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
